unnormalised: **Energy & Utilities: Solar Rooftop Subsidies Get a Sunny Boost!**
normalised: Energy and Utilities: Solar Rooftop Subsidies Get a Sunny Boost!

unnormalised: Good news, folks! The Ministry of New and Renewable Energy is giving a major push to rooftop solar, and your pocket’s gonna thank you. Turns out, those subsidies we've been hearing about are now easier to access than ever before, especially for residents of places like Jaipur and Lucknow.
normalised: Good news, folks! The Ministry of New and Renewable Energy is giving a major push to rooftop solar, and your pocket is going to thank you. Turns out, those subsidies we have been hearing about are now easier to access than ever before, especially for residents of places like Jaipur and Lucknow.

unnormalised: Think of it as your own personal 'Lagaan' moment – fighting for a brighter (and cheaper!) future, one solar panel at a time.
normalised: Think of it as your own personal 'Lagaan' moment – fighting for a brighter (and cheaper!) future, one solar panel at a time.

unnormalised: Sources at IIT-Delhi are reporting a significant increase in subsidy applications after the updated guidelines. The Central Government is shelling out a whopping Rs. 14,588 crores to boost installations.
normalised: Sources at I I T-Delhi are reporting a significant increase in subsidy applications after the updated guidelines. The Central Government is shelling out a whopping fourteen billion five hundred and eighty eight million rupees to boost installations.

unnormalised: So, if you've been humming and hawing about going solar, now's the time! Imagine powering your AC all summer and saving a ton of cash. Plus, you'll be doing your bit for the planet. The process is becoming streamlined, with DISCOMs simplifying the approval process. Early birds can get subsidies up to 40% for the first 3 kW and 20% beyond that, up to 10 kW.
normalised: So, if you have been humming and hawing about going solar, now is the time! Imagine powering your A C all summer and saving a ton of cash. Plus, you will be doing your bit for the planet. The process is becoming streamlined, with D I S C O M s simplifying the approval process. Early birds can get subsidies up to forty percent for the first three kilowatt and twenty percent beyond that, up to ten kilowatt.

unnormalised: Go on, make the switch and join the solar revolution! It's a light bulb moment, literally.
normalised: Go on, make the switch and join the solar revolution! It is a light bulb moment, literally.
